# ScamAI â€” Full Details

> All-in-one AI Trust Platform for detecting synthetic media and deepfakes in real-time.

ScamAI is built by Reality Inc. and provides enterprise-grade API-based deepfake detection and synthetic media verification. The platform achieves 95.3% detection accuracy with processing times under 200ms.

## Company

- **Legal Name:** Reality Inc.
- **Product:** ScamAI
- **Founded:** 2024
- **Website:** https://scam.ai
- **Contact:** contact@scam.ai
- **Compliance:** SOC 2 Type II, GDPR

## Products

### Vision Detection
Detect AI-generated images and deepfake videos with 95.3% accuracy. Real-time processing under 200ms.

**Use cases:**
- KYC (Know Your Customer) verification
- Content moderation for platforms
- Fraud prevention in financial services
- Media authentication for journalism
- Identity verification

**Capabilities:**
- Face swap detection
- GAN-generated image detection
- Diffusion model output detection (Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, Midjourney)
- Video deepfake detection
- Synthetic face detection

### Audio Detection
Identify synthetic voices, cloned audio, and AI-generated speech with industry-leading accuracy.

**Use cases:**
- Voice phishing (vishing) prevention
- Call center fraud detection
- Audio content verification
- Synthetic voice identification

**Capabilities:**
- Voice clone detection
- Text-to-speech detection
- Audio deepfake detection
- Real-time audio analysis

### Scam Database
Comprehensive database of known scams, fraud patterns, and synthetic media examples.

**Features:**
- Real-time threat intelligence
- Known scam pattern matching
- Fraud trend analysis
- API access for automated checking

## Pricing

| Tier | Price | Details |
|------|-------|---------|
| Free | $0/month | 200 images per month |
| Pay-as-you-go | $0.05/image | Base detection |
| Face Attributes Add-on | +$0.008/image | Age, gender, expression analysis |
| Liveness Detection Add-on | +$0.008/image | Anti-spoofing verification |
| ID Document Add-on | +$0.008/image | Document authenticity check |

Enterprise pricing available for high-volume users.

## Technology

- **AI Model:** Eva-v1
- **Accuracy:** 95.3%
- **Processing Time:** Under 200ms
- **API Format:** RESTful with JSON responses
- **Integration Time:** Under 10 minutes
- **SDKs:** Python, JavaScript, REST API

- [Home](https://scam.ai/en): Platform overview and key features

- [Audio Detection](https://scam.ai/en/products/audio-detection): Voice clone and synthetic audio detection

Available in: English, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Indonesian, Arabic
